message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity, but I'm looking to pay a bit less.  I'm happy to pay $100 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking to pay a bit less. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
